mapper.insert: insert into db_sysadmin (OPER, 'NAME', MOBILE, 'CLASS', 'PASSWORD', LOGINFLAG, LOGINIP, LOGINTIME, TEAM, GROUPID, AREA, MANAGERAREA, BIRTHDAY, IDENTIFYNUM, SEX, ACTIVEFLAG, LOCKED, TELEPHONE, DEPART, 'POSITION', SPCODE, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, OPERID, 'STORAGE', MENUID) values (#{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{class,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{loginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{team,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identifynum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activeflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{locked,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{storage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_sysadmin set 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'CLASS' = #{class,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'PASSWORD' = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGINFLAG = #{loginflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOGINIP = #{loginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGINTIME = #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TEAM = #{team,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUPID = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGERAREA = #{managerarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDENTIFYNUM = #{identifynum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVEFLAG = #{activeflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOCKED = #{locked,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPART = #{depart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'POSITION' = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPCODE = #{spcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERID = #{operid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'STORAGE' = #{storage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENUID = #{menuid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select OPER, 'NAME', MOBILE, 'CLASS', 'PASSWORD', LOGINFLAG, LOGINIP, LOGINTIME, TEAM, GROUPID, AREA, MANAGERAREA, BIRTHDAY, IDENTIFYNUM, SEX, ACTIVEFLAG, LOCKED, TELEPHONE, DEPART, 'POSITION', SPCODE, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, OPERID, 'STORAGE', MENUID from db_sysadmin where OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select OPER, 'NAME', MOBILE, 'CLASS', 'PASSWORD', LOGINFLAG, LOGINIP, LOGINTIME, TEAM, GROUPID, AREA, MANAGERAREA, BIRTHDAY, IDENTIFYNUM, SEX, ACTIVEFLAG, LOCKED, TELEPHONE, DEPART, 'POSITION', SPCODE, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, OPERID, 'STORAGE', MENUID from db_sysadmin
